title: Workshop on Designing Mobile Science Learning Utilizing Wearable Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy, experience with mobile devices, secondary-level science knowledge
context.additional_context: Scientific inquiry activity design using wearable technology in settings with limited access to laboratory equipment.

learning_goals: Learners can apply five major educational use cases of wearable technology in practical settings
Learners can propose three evaluation criteria for wearable technology required in mobile learning design
Learners can develop a design document for science experiment simulations using AR-based wearable devices
Learners can create learning activity scenarios incorporating wearable devices that collect biometric data

resources: AR content template for science education

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
